data.prayer: Lord, please give the 238 believers in the state of Tafilah the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tafilah, Jordan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Tafilah, Jordan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Tafilah, Jordan.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 238 believers in Tafilah, Jordan a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Tafilah, Jordan to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Arab, Saudi - Najdi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arab, Saudi - Najdi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arab, Saudi - Najdi people is yours.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Tafilah.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Tafilah, Jordan that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 238 believers in Tafilah, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.
